CustomField.description: Displays the overall contract term year and months
CustomField.formula: IF(Estimated_End_Date__c - Estimated_Start_Date__c >= 364, IF(ISBLANK(Contract_Term_Years__c), NULL,TEXT(Contract_Term_Years__c) & " Year" & IF( OR(Estimated_End_Date__c - Estimated_Start_Date__c >= 729, Estimated_End_Date__c - Estimated_Start_Date__c < 364 ), "s", NULL)) , NULL) & IF( OR( Contract_Term_Months__c != 0, Estimated_End_Date__c - Estimated_Start_Date__c < 30 ), " " & TEXT(Contract_Term_Months__c) & " Months", NULL)
CustomField.label: Contract Term
